Posts.Content: hello! wow hmmm, this is a tough one isnt' it. have you thought about a naturopath? one that can perhaps make some suggestion you can take back to you dr and see if that will interact with everything else you have going on.? you realy need not to suffer like this. i am going through the same thing at the moment ( long story) and cannot wait for my hrt meds to kick back in. good luck and please let us know what you find out peace and happiness~~Ocean~ xx
Posts.Title: hot flushes can any one help with tips to help relieve them
